snippet: The allegations, if confirmed, would expand the scope of the sexual abuse committed by peacekeepers deployed in the Central African Republic.
abstract: United Nations is investigating new allegations of sexual abuse by UN peacekeeping forces stationed in Central African Republic; latest set of allegations are in addition to previously reported abuses and are roundly condemned by UN officials, who express shock at their extremity.
lead_paragraph: The allegations, if confirmed, would expand the scope of the sexual abuse committed by peacekeepers deployed in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: U.N. Peacekeeping Hit by New Allegations of ‘Sickening’ Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: U.N. Peacekeeping Is Hit by New Allegations of ‘Sickening’ Sex Abuse of Girls

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
